lines.text: Well, if he has Stop tattoos under there...
Which he probably doesn't, but go on.
Maybe he thought what they did was they stopped things- like some kind of protective ward.
He was expecting them to stop the fire, but... they didn't stop the fire!
It just kept on burning, while the world was turning! He didn't light it, but he couldn't fight it!
That's not even how the lyrics-
I mean, that's ridiculous, and there's no evidence for it. So shut up.
